name: feature-oriented spacecraft design
description: Using concepts from feature-oriented software development, an Eclipse-Plugin for DLR-developed Virtual Satellite is implemented to establish a dynamic product line for the spacecraft design process.

name: maritime platform for translation of data
description: Polymorphic interface for translating NMEA0183 and NMEA2000 data, which are used in ship to ship and ship to shore communication.

name: mobile app: distributed ledger based health certificates
description: Mobile application to create health certificates and validate them through scanning a QR-code. The certificate owner's data remains on their phone. Doctors can use this app to create certificates. Connected to the distributed ledger based backend.

name: backend: distributed ledger based health certificates
description: Backend of the mobile app, providing access to the distributed ledger and implementation of a merkle tree to validate the data.
tech: rust, html, css, actix-web, distributed ledger

name: react portfolio website
description: Responsive website created to dynamically update and display the owner's projects.
tech: react, typescript, html, css, node.js, vercel
